course_title: Ecology of Emory University with Lab
course_description: This course will use ecological concepts to investigate the forests of the Emory campus.
prerequisites: This course requires ENVS 131  or ENVS_ OX 131 or BIOL_OX 111 or BIOL 142 or  BIOL_OX 142 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite OR permission of instructor.
sections:

Class Nbr: 2674, Section #: 2, Type: LAB, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: J. Wegner, Status: Open
